name: Powdery Mildew
symptoms: White powdery coating on leaves and stems.
treatment: Apply neem oil or sulfur spray; remove infected parts.

name: Leaf Spot
symptoms: Brown or black circular spots, often with yellow halo.
treatment: Remove affected leaves; improve air circulation; use neem oil.

name: Rust
symptoms: Orange-brown pustules on underside of leaves.
treatment: Prune affected leaves; copper fungicide as needed.

name: Blight
symptoms: Sudden wilting and browning of foliage.
treatment: Prune, dispose of debris; use appropriate fungicide.
